article_title: A cure for Trump/Hillary blues: Go with other races
article_text:
To many, the choice is depressing

Trump is a demagogue, but neither Sanders nor Clinton offers a cure for what ails the country

The best option may be involvement in worthwhile state or local races

article_metadata.news-keywords: presidential race, elections, U.S. voters, Hillary, Donald Trump, Marco Rubio
article_metadata.description: If you can’t stand the presidential choice, here’s a thought: Get involved in state or local races, or nonpartisan and volunteer activities.
article_metadata.title: A cure for Trump/Hillary blues: Go with other races | Miami Herald
